# citationcheckR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of citationcheckR is to make citing multiple package a little bit easier. Instead of having to copy and paste multiple citations, you can simply use citationcheckR to create multiple citations at once. 

## Installation

The development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("matthewwankiewicz/citationcheckR")
```
